title: Companion Approval Guide
content: r and let her take Mayrina Save Mayrina Requirement/s: In order to make Ethel surrender, you need to damage her enough without killing her. The cutscenes usually procs at around 10-15% health and activates when it is her turn. Shadowheart+Astarion + Gale -Karlach -Wyll - Auntie Ethel, Mayrina Overgrown Tunnel - Very end boss area where you fight Ethel again Give the Second Marriage Wand and Zombie Connor to Mayrina Save Mayrina Requirement/s: Mayrina need to be freed by Ethel or Ethel being dead
